languages.text: {n}Новое послание: "Предвестники Зари передают вам, братие, что корабль фон Валанциус направился к станции навигаторов. У вас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}есть время{/d} приготовить врагу теплую встречу".{/n}

{n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Новое послание: "Предвестники Зари передают вам, братие, что корабль фон Валанциус направился к станции навигаторов. У вас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}есть время{/d} приготовить врагу теплую встречу".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, O brethren, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigator station. You have time to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

{n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neues Sendschreiben: "Auroras Boten möchten Euch wissen lassen, Kameraden, dass von Valancius' Schiff auf dem Weg zur Station der Navigatoren ist. Ihr habt {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}Zeit{/d}, {mf|dem Feind|der Feindin} ein herzliches Willkommen zu bereiten."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neues Sendschreiben: "Auroras Boten möchten Euch wissen lassen, Kameraden, dass von Valancius' Schiff auf dem Weg zur Station der Navigatoren ist. Ihr habt Zeit, {mf|dem Feind|der Feindin} ein herzliches Willkommen zu bereiten."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nouvelle missive : « Camarades, les hérauts d'Aurore vous informent que le vaisseau de von Valancius se dirige vers la station des navigateurs. Vous avez le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}temps{/d} de préparer un chaleureux accueil à l'{mf|ennemi|ennemie}. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nouvelle missive : « Camarades, les hérauts d'Aurore vous informent que le vaisseau de von Valancius se dirige vers la station des navigateurs. Vous avez le temps de préparer un chaleureux accueil à l'{mf|ennemi|ennemie}. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}新消息：“同胞们，‘极光’先驱要告知你们，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的飞船正驶向导航者舰站。你们有充足的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}时间{/d}，为敌人准备热烈的欢迎仪式。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新消息：“同胞们，‘极光’先驱要告知你们，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的飞船正驶向导航者舰站。你们有充足的时间，为敌人准备热烈的欢迎仪式。“{/n}

languages.text: {n}新たな信書：「同志諸君、オーロラの先触れは、諸君らにフォン・ヴァランシウス艦が航宙士のステーションに向かったことを知っておいてほしいと望んでいる。敵を温かく迎える準備をする{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}時間{/d}はある」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新たな信書：「同志諸君、オーロラの先触れは、諸君らにフォン・ヴァランシウス艦が航宙士のステーションに向かったことを知っておいてほしいと望んでいる。敵を温かく迎える準備をする時間はある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nueva misiva: «Los Heraldos de Aurora desean que sepáis, camaradas, que la nave de von Valancius se dirige a la estación de los Navegantes. Tenéis {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}tiempo{/d} para preparar una cálida bienvenida al enemigo».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nueva misiva: «Los Heraldos de Aurora desean que sepáis, camaradas, que la nave de von Valancius se dirige a la estación de los Navegantes. Tenéis tiempo para preparar una cálida bienvenida al enemigo».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yeni tezkere: "Aurora'nın Müjdecileri şu hususu malumatınıza arz eder yoldaşlar: Von Valancius gemisi, Rotacı'nın istasyonuna doğru yola çıkmıştır. Düşmana sıcak bir karşılama sunmak için yeterli {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}vaktimiz{/d} mevcuttur."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}New missive: "Aurora's Harbingers wish you to know, comrades, that the von Valancius ship is heading for the Navigators' station. You've got {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Late}time{/d} to prepare a warm welcome for the enemy."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeni tezkere: "Aurora'nın Müjdecileri şu hususu malumatınıza arz eder yoldaşlar: Von Valancius gemisi, Rotacı'nın istasyonuna doğru yola çıkmıştır. Düşmana sıcak bir karşılama sunmak için yeterli vaktimiz mevcuttur."{/n}
